verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Only You, You alone are worthy of the glory, Lord
Every crown we'll ever wear, we lay it down
We bow our knee, we confess, You are Lord all by yourself
You reign alone, upon Your throne of righteousness
Only You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who is like the Lord our God, who reigns in majesty?
Who formed the earth and the heavens above--the mountains, deserts, and seas?
Who deserves honor and who deserves praise
and who is the sovereign king?
Only You...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who is like the Lord our God?
Who lifts those of low degree
And who by His grace and faithfulness
He calls us His family?
And who deserves honor?
And who deserves praise?
And who is the sovereign King?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We cry holy is the Lord
We cry worthy is the Lamb
We cry holy is the Lord
We exalt the great I Am
